insert into pcm_stock
shoppe_pro_sid,
stock_type_sid,
pro_sum,
channel_sid,
#{shoppeProSid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{stockTypeSid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{proSum,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{channelSid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
0,

mapper.select: select (sum(pro_sum) + (select ifnull(SUM(pro_sum),0) from pcm_stock where shoppe_pro_sid = #{shoppeProSid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and channel_sid != '0' and stock_type_sid = #{stockTypeSid,jdbcType=INTEGER}) ) as proSum from pcm_stock where shoppe_pro_sid = #{shoppeProSid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and channel_sid = '0'
mapper.update: update pcm_stock set pro_sum = pro_sum + #{proSum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, lock_count + #{lockCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert:
insert into pcm_stock
sid,
shoppe_pro_sid,
stock_type_sid,
pro_sum,
store_code,
channel_sid,
#{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{shoppeProSid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{stockTypeSid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{proSum,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{store_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{channelSid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
0,
